body: You know how people post things that they spend lots of time on like a map, then some of you say -1 horrible. Well that makes people feel really bad then they don't want to post anything agian. Well please don't say -1 horrible, just say what you liked about it and what should be improved or added. Because the person who posted that may not want to play anymore because they will get mad about it. So please don't say it was horrible -1. And thank you to those who already do.

title: Read Please

replies.body: There is already a thread by TheMasterCow...
replies.body_tagged: There is already a thread by TheMasterCow...

replies.body: oh, but not everyone will see that one. And I still see people doing it so I just wanted to remind you.
replies.body_tagged: oh, but not everyone will see that one. And I still see people doing it so I just wanted to remind you.

replies.body: If you think that a map does not deserve to be accepted, you may say "-1", and then your reasoning for that, as TheMasterCow stated.
replies.body_tagged: If you think that a map does not deserve to be accepted, you may say "-1", and then your reasoning for that, as TheMasterCow stated.

replies.body: lots of people looked at themastercow's thread, though :c
replies.body_tagged: lots of people looked at themastercow's thread, though :c

replies.body: When people say -1 they are just expressing their opinion. Its not that they dislike you in any way and you just have to accept that they do not like your map. Most likely other people will have a +1 for you if it bugs you too much
replies.body_tagged: When people say -1 they are just expressing their opinion. Its not that they dislike you in any way and you just have to accept that they do not like your map. Most likely other people will have a +1 for you if it bugs you too much

replies.body: and if they do say -1, they have more time to fix it and make <u>even more </u>people say +1(;
